nodes.text: The B0-2S Battle Droid was a Hutt battle droid which went berserk on Nar Shaddaa around 3642 BBY, when it was destroyed.

B0-2S Battle Droid appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Nar Shaddaa. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
